text: Yves Bouthillier (26 February 1901 – 4 January 1977) was a French politician. He served as the French Minister of Finance from 1940 to 1942. ==Early life== Bouthillier was born in Saint-Martin-de-Ré to Mathilde Bouju and Louis Bouthillier, a merchant. He graduated from the École Centrale Paris.Yves BOUTHILLIER. French Ministry of Economy and Finance ==Career== Bouthillier served as the French Ministry of Finance from 1940 to 1942. ==Personal life== Bouthillier married Germaine Bouju on 3 August 1922.
